name: standard-notes
description: Standard Notes is an end-to-end encrypted note-taking app with cross-platform clients and extensible editors. It can sync via official cloud or self-hosted servers for full data ownership.
features: End-to-end encryption: Encrypts all notes client-side before syncing to server.
Cross-platform sync: Syncs notes across desktop, mobile, and web applications.
Rich editors: Extends with editors for Markdown, code, spreadsheets, and more.
Tag organization: Organizes notes with nested tags and smart filters.
Version history: Accesses previous versions of notes for recovery and comparison.
Offline access: Works fully offline with automatic sync when connection returns.
Themes: Customizes appearance with various themes and color schemes.
Two-factor auth: Secures account with 2FA for additional protection.
File attachments: Attaches encrypted files to notes with cloud storage.
Listed blogging: Publishes notes as blog posts with Listed integration.
Import tools: Migrates notes from Evernote, Bear, and other apps.
Self-hosting option: Runs your own sync server for complete data control.
